attributes.action: Bring back hanging for Police and Child Killers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The lack of law and order continuous to be a major issue for this country, it's about time that cop and child killers should pay the ultimate penalty - hanging.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bring back hanging for Police and Child Killers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12065.asp

Prime Minister's Office
